fullText: Christopher Durang's comic riff on Chekhov is a bittersweet meditation on family dynamics that manages to be both deeply silly and surprisingly moving.
dtliExcerpt: Christopher Durang's comic riff on Chekhov is a bittersweet meditation on family dynamics that manages to be both deeply silly and surprisingly moving.
